Home » 40P22 Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
2 Kusalattika, Sahetukaduka
Kusalattika, Sahetukaduka
3.
14Nakusalaṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṃ nasahetukañca naabyākataṃ nasahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṃ nasahetukañca naakusalaṃ nasahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
15Hetuyā cha. Ārammaṇe cha…pe…  purejāte āsevane tīṇi…pe…  vipāke tīṇi…pe…  avigate cha.
4.
16Nakusalaṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṃ naahetukañca naabyākataṃ naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṃ naahetukañca naabyākataṃ naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṃ naahetukañca naakusalaṃ naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
17Hetuyā cha. Ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  sahajāte dvādasa…pe…  vipāke tīṇi…pe…  avigate dvādasa.
